citation.article-title: Taxonomic revision of water-bloom-forming species of oscillatorioid cyanobacteria
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Planktothricoides raciborskii comb. nov.

In addition to the properties listed in the genus description, the following properties are observed. Trichomes are pale blue-green or yellow-green. Apical cells are rounded, more or less tapered, bent but not pointed, bluntly conical and have no calyptra. Cell width is 5.4–2.2 μm, cell length is 1.7–6.7 μm and the ratio of cell length to cell width is 2: 7–1:1. On occasion, thick sections are found in a single trichome in both lab cultures and field samples. Growth temperature range is 20–30 °C; some strains grow at 40 °C. Salinity up to 0.78 % is tolerated for growth. The type strain is strain NIES 207T (= CCAP 1465\1T) (Table 5).
